tweets.html:
Throwing a "Dog With a Blog" party tonight. Anyone can come. Best night in television. Hoping the dog can keep his (her?) blog up to date.

— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) August 11, 2013

The only thing I want to be Breaking Bad on TV is this dog's goddamn blog which will drive the episode's story. B story is about fetching.

— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) August 11, 2013

Flash forward to dog's 12th birthday. He no longer has a blog! What happened? Can't wait to find out how we got to this point. #cantwait2die

— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) August 11, 2013

If you BitTorrent "Dog With a Blog," you're hurting the people who make the show. Please support the artists.

— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) August 11, 2013

Someone didn't like dog's latest entry. RT: @ladygaga: Dont focus on ANY blogger criticism...Trust the artist bloggers are not critics

— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) August 11, 2013

Ladies, if theres one thing DIFFICULT MEN taught me its that if you wanna make TV just be a huge dick & everyone will be super accommodating

— Emily Yoshida (@emilyyoshida) August 11, 2013

You can fire people for no reason, disappear in the middle of shoots and absolutely nobody will chalk it up to menstrual problems

— Emily Yoshida (@emilyyoshida) August 11, 2013

The glass ceiling will remain intact until Lena Dunham or Liz Meriwether gets in a drunken writers room fistfight

— Emily Yoshida (@emilyyoshida) August 11, 2013

WE LIVE IN A WORLD WHERE CONNIE BRITTON NEVER GOT AN EMMY FOR FNL BUT COULD FOR NASHVILLE. Just some thoughts 4 u on this lovely Sunday.

So Katie Lowes who plays Quinn just favorited one of my I hate Quinn tweets. Takes a special gal to fave when someone hates their character.

I still think the next Doctor should break with tradition and be a cat

Gina Marie can do low blows. And, as we know from the froyo challenge, she has no gag reflex. WIFE MATERIAL, PEOPLE. WIFE MATERIAL. #bb15

This is all to just remind you that these people unanimously picked the child porn enthusiast over the Bear-shirted sweetheart. #bb15

Public Service Announcement about getting help for depression in the final slot right before #bb15 resumes. I love TV.

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) August 12, 2013

After this season Big Brother should change its terminology from ‚Äúevicting a houseguest‚Äù to ‚Äúmaking a houseguest black.‚Äù #bb15

"Tonight: we set a world record for twerking!" --An actual thing the announcer just said. MY GOD. #TeenChoice

If #TeenChoice sets a record for LACK of twerking, I'll be impressed. But their current goal seems problematic to say the least.

Someone alert the authorities, this guy is at the Teen Choice awards: pic.twitter.com/C7m34Hyf8R

Sigh. Goo does not inherently equal drama, "True Blood." Or other purveyors of goo. #TrueBlood

tweets.html:
#TheNewsroom is just reminding me of all the other shows that did "dad stuff" better.

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) August 12, 2013

Hey‚Ä¶. I liked that! That's weird! #TheNewsroom

— MavisGaryVEVO (@MisterMcCracken) August 12, 2013

The #Newsroom often makes me want to go buy a rocket launcher and see what it can do to my TV. But I keep watching, & tonite's ep was good

— Ben Grossman (@grossman) August 12, 2013

I feel better knowing that Low Winter Sun and The Bridge can keep each other company on my DVR as the crime dramas I'll never watch.

— Louis Peitzman (@LouisPeitzman) August 12, 2013

I would watch TALKING BAD if it was half an hour on the marketing and regional distribution prospects for Schraderbrau.

Forcing me to get through 20 min of a new show to see previews for next week's #BreakingBad does not make me like your new show, AMC

After all that, looks like all people are tweeting about Low Winter Sun is that they‚Äôre pissed about waiting for the Breaking Bad preview.

I was expecting the winter sun to be a lot lower.

Does Chris Hardwick have incriminating photos of the AMC execs? Why is Talking Bad happening? I just.... so many questions.

julie bowen actually seems like a fitting guest, though? lots of expertise on playing a disliked spouse on a popular tv show. #TalkingBad

Doesn't the review headline write itself? "Talking, Bad."

— PJ Rodriguez (@pjrodriguez) August 12, 2013

On the next ‚ÄúTalking Benson,‚Äù remembering all the wacky episodes where Benson & Krauss accidentally got married. Episodes, plural.

Tonight‚Äôs double length episode of ‚ÄúTalking Winter Sun‚Äù will run two minutes. Adjust DVRs accordingly.

Breaking Bad is PROBABLY the best TV show ever about crystal meth

— Sam Stryker (@sbstryker) August 11, 2013

I'm half-afraid Time Warner Cable will just stop the "Breaking Bad" season premiere halfway through and tell us it's CBS's fault.

— Tim Carvell (@timcarvell) August 11, 2013

If you're not sure where to start with Breaking Bad, I'd recommend all of Season 1, then all of Seasons 2-4, then the 1st half of Season 5.

Going to keep AMC on all day just in case they accidentally start Breaking Bad early. #BreakingBad

— Brent Piaskoski (@BrentPiaskoski) August 11, 2013

breaking bad prediction: i have sex with jesse pinkman while yelling "yeah, chemistry, bitch!"

Sorry guys: Just heard BREAKING BAD's not airing tonight. Don't know what the problem is.

— Keith Phipps (@kphipps3000) August 11, 2013

Walter White has made every Pontiac Aztek look so fucking hardcore.

— kelly oxford (@kellyoxford) August 11, 2013

Fuck Yes! About to finally get off the shitter in T minus 5 hours! @BreakingBad_AMC

Obligatory BREAKING BAD tweet.
